start.text: It's 1985, and you're lacing up your neon rollerskates outside the local arcade. The air smells like cheeseburgers from the diner next door, and synth-pop blares from a nearby boombox. Suddenly, a mysterious glitch in the arcade's marquee catches your eye. As you roll closer, you're enveloped in a shower of pixelated light. When it clears, you find yourself inside a mash-up of your favorite video games! A floating 8-bit menu appears, asking you to choose your first move:

choices.text: Enter the maze-like corridors of a pellet-munching frenzy?
Leap into a world of platforms, pipes, and mushroom power-ups?
Grab a laser blaster and defend Earth from descending space invaders?

1.text: You roll into a neon maze, the wheels of your skates leaving trails of light behind you. Ghost-like creatures lurk around corners, and power pellets pulse invitingly. A pixelated cheeseburger appears, granting you temporary invincibility. Where do you go next?

choices.text: Chase after the gang of ghosts, turning the tables on them?
Search for the maze's hidden warp zones?
Collect enough pellets to unlock the bonus stage?

2.text: You land in a vibrant world of blocks, coins, and mysterious pipes. Your rollerskates have transformed into bouncy shoes, perfect for stomping goombas. In the distance, you spot three power-ups floating enticingly. Which do you choose?

choices.text: The hamburger that makes you grow to giant size?
The glowing rollerskate that grants super speed?
The star-shaped cassette tape that makes you invincible?

3.text: You find yourself at the controls of a pixelated spaceship, defending Earth from waves of descending aliens. Your rollerskates have become the ship's thrusters, and you're armed with a cheeseburger cannon. The mothership appears, offering three power-ups. Which do you choose?

choices.text: The spread shot upgrade, firing fries in multiple directions?
The shield generator, creating a force field of onion rings?
The time warp, slowing down the alien advance?

1A.text: You charge after the ghosts, your skates leaving a trail of 80s music notes. As you corner them, you realize...

choices.text: They're actually misunderstood spirits who just want to start a roller disco?
It's your friends in disguise, planning your surprise birthday party?
They're game developers trapped by a malevolent AI, seeking your help?

1B.text: You discover a hidden warp zone behind a neon 'Exit' sign. As you skate through, you find yourself...

choices.text: In a secret level designed entirely out of breakfast cereals?
At the wrap party for your favorite 80s sitcom?
In the legendary lost arcade of Alexandria?

1C.text: You collect enough pellets to trigger the bonus stage. The maze transforms into...

choices.text: A giant pinball machine where you're the ball?
A dance-off against the ghosts on light-up floor tiles?
A cheeseburger-stacking competition judged by video game legends?

2A.text: The hamburger power-up makes you grow to enormous size. From your new vantage point, you see...

choices.text: The entire game world is actually inside an arcade cabinet?
A drive-in theater screen showing the secret ending to your favorite game?
Game characters from other cabinets waving for your help?

2B.text: The glowing rollerskate grants you incredible speed. As you zoom through the level, you accidentally...

choices.text: Create a time warp, bringing characters from future games into this world?
Crash through the 'skybox', revealing a giant 80s bedroom behind the game world?
Trigger a glitch that turns everything into a text adventure?

2C.text: The star-shaped cassette makes you invincible, accompanied by an awesome 8-bit guitar solo. Your newfound power...

choices.text: Attracts a crowd of video game characters seeking your autograph?
Causes you to burst through into other classic games, mashing them up?
Transforms the entire game world into a battle of the bands competition?

3A.text: Your cheeseburger cannon now fires fries in all directions. As you clear the screen of aliens, you notice...

choices.text: The aliens were actually trying to deliver an intergalactic pizza order?
Each defeated alien turns into a classic arcade cabinet?
Your high score is broadcasting a message to alien civilizations?

3B.text: The onion ring force field repels the alien attacks. In the momentary calm, you realize...

choices.text: The entire space battle is a misunderstanding over a cosmic drive-thru order?
Your ship is actually powered by a hamster on a wheel?
The aliens just wanted to challenge you to a game of intergalactic rollerskate hockey?

3C.text: The time warp slows the alien advance to a crawl. In the distorted time stream, you witness...

choices.text: The past and future of arcade games colliding in a temporal traffic jam?
The entire alien invasion is a game being played by giant cosmic beings?
A younger version of yourself entering the arcade, creating a time loop?

end.text: In a flash of pixelated light, you find yourself back outside the arcade, rollerskates still on your feet. The marquee flickers normally, and the smell of cheeseburgers wafts by. Was it all just a vivid daydream? You notice your pockets are full of arcade tokens that weren't there before, and your high-score initials are mysteriously at the top of every game's leaderboard. With a smile, you skate into the arcade, ready for your next adventure, real or virtual.
